name: Decimate
description: Attack your opponent for 10% of their current hit points. You lose 10% (rounded up) of your troops. You deal additional damage equal to the number of troops lost. Then deploy 1 Troop.

immediateEffect.script: int baseDamage = (int)(Opponent.CurrentHP * 0.10); int troops = State.ContainsKey("troops") ? (int)State["troops"] : 0; int troopsLost = (int)Math.Ceiling(troops * 0.10); if (!State.ContainsKey("troops")) State["troops"] = 0; State["troops"] = Math.Max(0, (int)State["troops"] - troopsLost); int totalDamage = baseDamage + troopsLost; DealDamage(Opponent, totalDamage); State["troops"] = (int)State["troops"] + 1;
